RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered I n Eligibility). (Colts And Geldings Preferred). (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONEY MATTERS set the pace, had the lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. PAPERBACK HERO was off a step slow, trailed the field on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch finished well. LIL GREEN MACHINE stalked the early leaders and was roused on the turn but needed more. ACE DESTROYER was away alertly and had a mild bid on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch leveled off. ARTIE MY BOY tracked the leaders from the outside and raced evenly on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had no late kick.

ENTRY.NAME: Paperback Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, trailed turn, 3-path stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Green Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leaders, roused turn, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Money Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, led turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Ace Destroyer
ENTRY.OWNER: Radcliffe Racing Stable and Admiral Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, mild bid turn, 5-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Artie My Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, evenly turn, 4-path stretch, no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 21600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 120 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VITAL SIGNS was away alertly, had a slim lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch fought gamely for the win. I LIVE BY FAITH tracked the early leaders, was a factor on the turn and had the lead from the five path in upper stretch but was outgunned. AUTUMN'S SO FLASHY settled off the pace and gained ground on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. I'M NO SLEEPY JOE was well back, trailed the field on the turn and angled out in mid stretch to get up for a share. LETS SAY THIS forced the pace and dueled on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch weakened. BEYOND TALENTED was up close but chased on the turn and had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Vital Signs
ENTRY.OWNER: Ascot Stud Blake Sr Michael S Stout Mark and Stocker-Parks Rachel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, slim lead turn, 3-path stretch, fought gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Lets Say This
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, dueled turn, 3-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Talented
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, chased turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Autumn's So Flashy
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, gained ground turn, 5-path stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: I Live by Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, factor turn, led 5-path stretch, outgunned

ENTRY.NAME: I'm No Sleepy Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed turn, angled out stretch, up for share

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5, 000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THY KINGDOM tracked the early leaders from the inside, had a slim lead on the far turn and was much the best. VICTORY MARCH stalked the early leader and dueled on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. QUIET REBEL was unhurried early, roused on the far turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch was up for show. FOUR BOUNCE set a pressured pace and was a factor on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch faded. DYNAMIC MISSION was off the pace and showed little in a dull effort. SIR GRAYVENSCROFT was in touch but chased on the far turn and dropped back through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Thy Kingdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, slim lead far turn, much the best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: HomePride Farm, Hayden Noriega,Don Ameche III & Cory Willi

ENTRY.NAME: Dynamic Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed little, dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Four Bounce
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Rebel
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, roused far turn, 6-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Victory March
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, dueled far turn, 5-path stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Grayvenscroft
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, chased far turn, dropped back stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(Limited to 10 starters) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HADDASSAH'S DEVIL set the pace, had a clear lead on the far turn and from the three path through the stretch drew off. REDOUTE'S LIGHT was off the pace, had a mild gain on the far turn and was up for place. BEN LOMOND stalked the early leader and was a factor on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. WILLIAM BOY was in touch early and saved ground on the far turn but was not a factor. AM PREPARED was in range early but lost ground on the far turn and was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Haddassah's Devil
ENTRY.OWNER: Catalano Gerard Gnozzo Victor A and Davis Richard M
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead far turn, 3-path stretch, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Ben Lomond
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: William Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch early, saved ground far turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Redoute's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain far turn, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Am Prepared
ENTRY.OWNER: Roberto Joseph I and Cathcart Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range early, lost ground far turn, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Br ed/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRIVATE LAKE was unhurried early, moved up on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch proved best. FOUR KNIGHTS set the pace and had a clear lead on the far turn but was headed at the top of the stretch and gave way. THE NEWFIE EXPRESS was in range and had a mild gain on the far turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch needed more. THELONIOUS stalked the early leader and was a factor on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch had no kick. LOQUACIOUS was off the pace and gained ground on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was no real threat. CALMING INFLUENCE was in touch but chased on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch had no impact. DOODLE DANDY was well back and showed nothing while outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Four Knights
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead far turn, headed top stretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Thelonious
ENTRY.OWNER: Centennial Farms (Niagara) Inc and Lennox John
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Calming Influence
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, chased far turn, 3-path stretch, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: The Newfie Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, mild gain far turn, 6-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Private Lake
ENTRY.OWNER: Catalano Gerard Gnozzo Victor A and Davis Richard M
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, moved up far turn, 4-path stretch, proved best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. K. K. Jayaraman & Dr. V. Devi Jayaraman

ENTRY.NAME: Loquacious
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, gained ground far turn, 4-p stretch, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Doodle Dandy
ENTRY.OWNER: Hoad Lindsey L and Hoad Joseph B
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed nothing, outrun

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awar ds).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GETTING AHEAD set the pace, had the lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch prevailed. LOVE MY CHERYL was in range and moved up on the turn but was clearly second best. MAKES SENSE TO ME was off the pace and had a mild gain on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch finished evenly. UNABLE stalked the early leader and was a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was all out. HEAR ME KNOCKING was in touch and saved ground on the turn but was not a factor. SHES ASTYLISH KATZ had no speed and was roused on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Hear Me Knocking
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, saved ground turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Getting Ahead
ENTRY.OWNER: Lippi Linda Irwin Wilfred M and Weingarten David
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, led turn, 3-path stretch, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Unable
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor turn, 4-path stretch, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, moved up turn, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Shes Astylish Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, roused turn, 6-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Makes Sense to Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain turn, 5-path stretch, evenly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 21600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 120 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 8 Starters)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the tu rf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILBERFORCE showed speed from the inside, had a clear lead on the turn and drifted through the stretch but held sway. EIN WAHRER SOLDAT was hustled early, a factor on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch finished well on the rail. STREET MAX had no speed, was hustled along on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was up for show. BREACH OF TRUST stalked the leader and was roused on the turn but had nothing left. AMEN TO THAT was off the pace, showed little and was never a threat. GREY DECEPTION was well back and showed nothing while never in contention.

ENTRY.NAME: Wilberforce
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, clear lead turn, drifted stretch, held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Edward Seltzer, Beverly Anderson,Krista Seltzer & Jamie Fr

ENTRY.NAME: Amen to That
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed little, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Grey Deception
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed nothing, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Breach of Trust
ENTRY.OWNER: Lee Ken Mitchell Dennis Bell Donald K and Bell Gaye
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, roused turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Street Max
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, hustled along turn, 3-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Ein Wahrer Soldat
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, factor turn, 4-path stretch, finished well inside
